import React from 'react' import SlickSlider from 'react-slick' import {IconButton} from '@material-ui/core' import {ArrowLeft, ArrowRight} from '@material-ui/icons' import {useStyles} from './useStyle' import {settings} from './sliderSettings' const MainSlider = () => { const classes = useStyles(); return (
(this.slider = c)} {...settings}>
) } export default MainSlider;
